item.title: About
item.description: What is CNCS? The full name of CNCS is Cloud Native Computing Sphere, mainly focus on cloud native related open source technologies. Our goal? Become the Chinese version of CNCF. Who are we? We are enthusiasts from all over China who love open source and open source sharing. If you are also an open source enthusiast and are interested in joining us, please contact us. What are we doing? We are and will continue to pay attention to and research cloud native open source technologies, and are committed to the promotion and preaching of cloud native open source technologies in China.

item.title: Contact
item.description: We are here to help you 有什么问题，就联系我们吧。
